nodes.text: A model of medical frigate was used by the Galactic Republic during the High Republic Era. Two such ships were part of a Republic rescue fleet sent to assist Trymant IV in the wake of an Emergence following the Great Hyperspace Disaster. The Emergence, however, coincided with a Nihil attack on the planet, and one frigate became part of a blockade hastily set up to prevent the escape of a Nihil Spider Cruiser. Eye of the Nihil Marchion Ro had the cruiser fire upon the medical frigate as a distraction for its escort of Jedi Vectors, allowing the pirate ship to escape into hyperspace.

The medical frigate was introduced in The High Republic Adventures 2. In one panel of the comic, the design of one of these ships greatly resembles that of the Pelta-class frigate, a vessel that first appeared in the 2008 film Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
